item.title: One anniversary year at NOW GmbH
Life Lately: Work and Personal Updates
item.description: Time flies. A reflection on the past 10 months time in my new job.

item.title: New Year Reflections
item.description: New Year is always a good time to do reflections for the past year and set new resolutions for next year.

item.title: China Trip
item.description: Why do my eyes often contain tears? Because I love this land deeply.

item.title: MLOps Final Project: Build an end-to-end machine learning project
item.description: Only 15% of machine learning models are deployed in production. How to fast deploy the ML model in cloud and build an end-to-end ML project is a challenge. Thanks to MLOps Zoomcamp, I am able to learn a lot of new topics and practice this in this final project.

item.title: The journey of AWS Certified Solutions Architect
item.description: I am proud to share that I just passed AWS Certified Solutions Architect. It was a challenging journey. But it’s worth doing it.

item.title: My Spring time 2023
item.description: Spring and summer in Berlin are truly wonderful time of the year. However, I have realized that I have taken on too many plans all at once. It’s important for me to take a step back and rethink how I can approach things better next time.

item.title: Week 7 Final Project: Build an End-to-end Data Pipeline for Reporting CO2 and other greenhouse gases
item.description: Climate change is one of the most challenges of our time. I use the techniques and tools learned in the course to build an end-to-end data pipeline and CO2 dashboard.

item.title: Create a Free Custom Domain-based email address
item.description: Once I’ve established my personal website, the next step is to create a professional email address. The good news, you can create a custom email address with Zoho for free, which takes only 5 minutes to complete.

item.title: Take A Break and Continue
item.description: I took a break to reflect and recharge. ChatGPT is a powerful tool. But it can’t solve every problem. The panic I experienced was genuine, but taking a break allows me to move forward with renewed energy.

item.title: Week 4 Data Engineering Zoomcamp Notes: Analytics Engineering and dbt
item.description: I had completed the analytics engineering bootcamp in Udemy. So data modelling and dbt are not new to me. In week 4, some interesting take-aways for me are the usage of dbt cloud and the software engineering best practices like modularity, portability, CI/CD, and documentation. Great course as usual from dezoomcamp!

item.title: Week 3 Data Engineering Zoomcamp Notes: Data Warehouse and BigQuery
item.description: In week 3 we learned data warehouse and google Big Query. Some best practices like creating external table, partition and clustering tables are introduced. We can even do machine learning in Big Query.

item.title: Week 2 Data Engineering Zoomcamp Notes: Prefect
item.description: In week 2 we learned Prefect to manage our data flow. I like Prefect very much because it allows to use python to define tasks and flows. Very interesting topic to learn!

item.title: Maximizing Efficiency with ChatGPT: My Experience
item.description: ChatGPT is impressive. To maximize its potential and increase efficiency, here’s my advice based on my experience.

item.title: Week 1 Data Engineering Zoomcamp Notes
item.description: During week 1, participants learned how to build a data pipeline and retrieve and ingest data using Docker, Postgres, Docker-compose, Terraform and Google Cloud.

item.title: Introduction of Google Analytics API
item.description: The Google APIs are effective tools for managing large or complex Google Analytics accounts. They allow developers to programmatically extract historical GA data or list all GA properties with custom dimensions, saving a tremendous amount of time.

item.title: A Custom Domain For My Hugo Personal Website Hosted On Github Pages
item.description: I bought a domain called xiahe-bleinagel.com on Amazon Route 53. I will show you how to setup in order to visit this custom domain correctly.

item.title: AWS IAM Day 1
item.description: Do you ever think of getting AWS Cloud certificates? This is one of my 2023 resolutions. Let’s learn together. Day 1 is all about the best practices of AWS IAM.

item.title: From A Stay-At-Home Mom To A Data Scientist
item.description: Life goes up and down. Important is that you never give up. Everyone has a chance to achieve his/her goal. This is my story of how I got a tech job from a stay-at-home mom. Remember, you are the best.

item.title: Create a Personal Website With Hugo
item.description: I built a personal website with Hugo successfully. I want to write down some key points to share my learning experience. Hugo is a static site generator and super fast. We will build one site with a theme template in 10 minutes.

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, I’m Xia, and I bring a diverse background and a wealth of experience to the dynamic world of data science. Armed with a Master’s degree in Automotive Engineering, I embarked on a transformative journey by earning a second Master’s in Data Science. This unique blend of engineering and data expertise has equipped me with a holistic understanding of complex systems. My professional journey has been marked by significant experiences in various sectors.

item.title: Contact me
item.description: You can get in touch with me via email and consult my professional profile on LinkedIn.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy Effective date: 2023-03-01 Our website is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide to us when you visit our website, and our practices for collecting, using, maintaining, protecting, and disclosing that information. Information we collect We may collect personal information that you provide to us when you sign up for our newsletter or contact us through our website.
